phrases: (Where did that even come from, right?)
I decided I am going to confess to my crush.
I am going to do it today.
I know I am being a wuss,
but I always freak out when I try to tell you in person,
Wait, no, she is a girl.
I got to do things in order.
It is not a big deal,
It is not a big deal, but you seem surprisingly popular with girls.
But you do not have a girlfriend.
but you seem surprisingly popular with girls.
But you do not have a girlfriend.
I am not gay!! () I want a girlfriend!! (><)
Nii-chan, can I play video games?
Why do not you find a boyfriend?
Are not you interested in anyone? v)
Why do not you find a boyfriend?
Are not you interested in anyone?
Was that a bad thing to ask?
But when am I going to do it if not now?
What if he rejects me, though?
Is it safe for me to confess?
I am interested in you, Takase.
Sorry to tell you like this, but I like you.
I do not care if you reject me.
Just please do not hate me...
I do not care if you reject me.
Just please do not hate me!
I mean, this is going well, but...
About what we were saying, there is actually someone I like.
About what we were saying, there is actually someone I like.
Maybe he sent me something at the same time.
About what we were saying, there is actually someone I like.
I will tell you at school tomorrow.
Can you wait for me after school?
You know those people who confess by text?
You know those people who confess by text?
I think that is pretty shitty (Where did that even come from, right?)
I think that is pretty shitty.
I think that is pretty shitty...
I think that is pretty shitty...
I am interested in... I am interested in you, Takase.
Sorry to tell you like this, but I like you.
Nii-chan, I am going to sleep, so turn off the lights
Saki-chan, I need the peach plate back.
My childhood friend, Nanase, always looks grouchy.
That is just my normal face.
You found us a really cute new member!
That is the next president for you!
I am only here because I am interested in stars.
It is not because Kaga invited me.
You two seem close, I thought you were dati
Nanase and I just happen to live close together.
This happens as soon as I say we are childhood friends.
I do not think anything of Nanase.
I do not think anything of him, either.
Besides, it seems Kaga has a crush on someone else.
Want me to take a guess?
And it was just getting good.
Let us come back to this later.
There is no way you would be interested in stars.
You are after Senpai, are not you?
It is not any of your business, either!
Why do you keep asking me?
Because I want her to reject you already.
You started ignoring me ever since middle school.
Do you like it when people think we are weirdly attached and stuff?
You do not like it when people think we are close, huh?
You do not want people spreading rumors about us?
I was doing that for your sake.
What do you mean, for my sake?
You just suddenly started ignoring me.
You were the one who hated me first.
I would not go to the same school as you if I hated you!
I have no idea what you are talking about.
Kaga, you idiot, can you still not figure it out?
You do not have a problem talking to anyone else,
You were indifferent to everyone else, though,
so I thought you would never be interested in anyone.
I was not thinking about how you felt.
You have been worried for me all this time, have not you?
We have been friends for a long time?
You do not get it, do you?
Do you honestly think I would do all this for you just because we have been friends?
B-But you just said you do not hate me.
You joined the astronomy club just to piss me off?
I confessed to my crush, and now we are dating.
G-Goda-kun, let us walk home together
Maybe we should have stayed friends.
Nah, we have only just started dating.
I need to be more proactive.
I am sorry I made you wait, too.
I am here late on days I have club work.
From now on, why do not we
No, it is not safe to go home late.
I wonder if he did not want to go out with me.
I wonder if I am just making him uncomfortable.
No, Goda-kun's just a nice person.
Did he avoid me just now?
Maybe he is worried he might be sweaty from club work?
He was not avoiding me, was he?
Kamine, let us stop doing this.
Sorry, I should have told you sooner.
This is my first time dating anyone.
I did not know what it is supposed to be like.
But I have been thinking, and this is not good.
So I want to make this easy for you.
I probably should not tell you like this, but...
Thanks for going out with me.
S-Sorry, I did not mean to make you cry.
Can we go back to how things were?
But maybe not exactly how it was.
Why do not we try holding hands or something?
We are in a relationship, after all.
No, were not you about to dump me?
I never said anything like that.
I just meant we should stop being so tense around each other.
Was I the only one who was getting tense?
Sorry, I had the wrong idea.
I, well, thought it would be weird to start acting like a boyfriend
as soon as we started dating.
So I was trying to act like everything was how it had always been,
but that is kind of cold, too.
So I have been thinking about your walk home and stuff.
Then why did you avoid me when I tried to get next to you?
I was sweaty from club work.
No, actually, it is because I am shy.
Sorry, I did not see anything!
Yuki, can you take these apples to Nanase-san's place?
What is the matter with you?
Did you get in a fight with Kaoru-chan?
We did not, but she kind of hates me.
I thought Kaoru-chan had a crush on you.
Wait, was this still a secret?
Next episode: We Do not Need Girls.
